page.title: 20GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: {ICE CREAM AND ICE LOLLIES}is a game where someone is 'it' and all the others line up with their hands joined.The person who is 'it' tells a story. When they come to the words 'Ice cream and Ice lollies' the other children all run away and the caller tries to catch them. Anyone who is caught stands by the wall. When four are caught the storyteller touches the last one caught and then all are free again. In the playground we also play{FISHES. You have to get into groups of no more than five. Your group has to have a fish name like Jellyfish. Then you do 'Ip Dip'for someone to be Chaser. The chaser chooses a group and they have to run down to the other end of the pitch without being caught. The last one to be caught is 'it' for the next round.
